title: Bible Black Gaiden (Bible Black Origins)
synopsis: After their rejected request to create a formal student magic club, Hiroko Takashiro, Saki Shidou, and Rie Morita are forced to continue practicing witchcraft in their free time only. One day, Rie comes across a dusty, hand-written book. Found on a sales pile in an antique shop, the manuscript seems to be nothing more than a foreign curiosity.
characters: ['Kitami, Reika', 'Takashiro, Hiroko', 'Kozono, Nami', 'Mochida, Junko', 'Morita, Rie', 'Hiraya, Seiji', 'Shidou, Saki']
